title: The Chase (CRE203)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the third episode from our second season, Michael Showalter, Jon Friedman, Kerri Heidecker and April Salazar share about the pursuits of pursuers and the pursued.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Keri Heidecker, April Salazar, Jeff Mercel, Jon Friedman, Michael Showalter, Dan Lubell, Dogbowl, The Dog Whisperer, Lagos Disco Machine, Evan Voytas, DJ Lobsterdust, Thick Business, Los Kinkos, Dustin Wong, Lenlow, People Like Us, Joe Frank, Shawn Lee's Ping Pong Orchestra, Ergo Phizmizz, Kevin Allison)
